entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 1400 metres this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy. Snow level 1300 metres. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14 except 17 near Osoyoos.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 14 except 17 near Osoyoos. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
